title: Schumer Can Take the Insults, if It Helps Keep Democrats in Power
description: Senator Chuck Schumer, heavily favored to defeat his Republican challenger, Joseph Pinion, argued in a debate as much for his party as for his re-election.
dc:creator: Jesse McKinley
media:description: Chuck Schumer, right, defended his record and that of Congressional Democrats as he debated Joseph Pinion, left, in a debate held Sunday by Spectrum News.
